Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [B | F#7sus | G#m | E]
VERSE 1: To the cross I [B]look, to the cross I [F#7sus]cling Of it's suffering I do[G#m] drink, of it's work I do[E] sing For on it my s[B]avior, both bruised and cr[F#7sus]ushed Showed that God is [G#m]love and God is [E]just
CHORUS: [B]At the cross You beckon me [G#m]You draw me gently to my knees, and I am [F#7sus]Lost for words, so lost in love, I'm [E]Sweetly broken, wholly surrendered[B | G#m | F#m7sus | E]
VERSE 2: What a priceless [B]gift, undeserved l[F#7sus]ife Have I been g[G#m]iven through Christ crucif[E]ied You've called me out of d[B]eath, You've called me into [F#7sus]life I was under your wr[G#m]ath, Now through the cross I'm reconc[E]iled
BRIDGE: [C#m]In awe of the cross I must conf[E]ess [C#m]How wondrous Your redeeming love And how [E]great is Your faithful[F#7sus]ness [B]
